name: Bowlopolis Bowlerdash
description:
Bowlopolis Bowlerdash is a racing game which combines the fun of bowling with the exhilaration of racing. With some of the characters from the favorite bowling animated series, Bowlopolis, you can race with a character of your choice.

There is no game attached to this page because, this is merely a page to show off a game I worked on. The game was released to the App Store for iPad and iPhone. It's free so if you would like to play the game and have an iOS device go here.
